Container.Name: BeoRadioScrobbler
Container.Overview: Scrobbles Tracks played on a Bang & Olufsen Speaker supporting BeoNetRemote Client API via radio.

Config.Name: LASTFM_API_KEY
Config.Description: The API key generated on LAST.FM

Config.Name: LASTFM_API_SECRET
Config.Description: The API secret generated on LAST.FM

Config.Name: LASTFM_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Your LAST.FM password. Only stored as an environment variable. Not exposed, getting hashed from library pylast.

Config.Name: LOCAL_TIMEZONE
Config.Description: Time zone like 'Europe/Berlin' - will be defaulted to UTC if empty.

Config.Name: RUN_MODE
Config.Description: See documentation page. Possible values: ['production', 'detect', 'notify_me']. Will default to 'detect' if empty.

Config.Name: BEO_IP
Config.Description: IP address of the B&O device, in the format '192.168.1.1'.

Config.Name: appdata
Config.Description: The folder on your system that will contain 'logs' and 'config' folders. Most likely: appdata/beoradioscrobbler

Config.Name: LOGLEVEL
Config.Description: Log level in general log file. INFO, DEBUG. Defaults to INFO.
